issues.title: Failed to connect to peer
issues.technical_explanation: The node is unable to establish a connection with a peer, which is essential for network communication and block synchronization.
issues.recommended_fix: Check network connectivity, firewall settings, and ensure that the peer is online and reachable.

issues.title: Low disk space
issues.technical_explanation: The node is running low on disk space, which can affect its ability to store blockchain data and logs.
issues.recommended_fix: Free up disk space by deleting unnecessary files or increasing the disk capacity.

issues.title: Block sync stalled
issues.technical_explanation: The node has stopped syncing blocks at height 102934, which may indicate issues with peer connections or resource limitations.
issues.recommended_fix: Investigate peer connections, check for any errors in the log, and ensure that the node has sufficient resources to continue syncing.

issues.title: Connection timeout
issues.technical_explanation: The node experienced a timeout while trying to connect to a peer after 30 seconds, indicating potential network issues.
issues.recommended_fix: Check network stability and peer availability, and consider increasing the timeout settings if necessary.
